'''0.975<ref>{{link |url=https://web.archive.org/web/20130322033926/http://minecraftedu.tumblr.com/post/17991870774/new-version-soon|title=New version soon! |website=Tumblr |date=December 24, 2011}}</ref>'''<ref>{{Link|url=https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/14737430409/0975-released-whats-next|title=0.975 released - what’s next?|website=Tumblr|date=December 24, 2011}}</ref> is a major update to MinecraftEdu, which adds a new block, new building tools, and a new [[Teacher Menu|Teacher menu]] tab. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.0.0]].{{Info needed}}

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Foundation block.png|width=32x32]] [[Foundation block]]'''<ref>[[MinecraftEdu mod 0.975#logs|MinecraftEdu logs]]: "''<@kulttuuri> Foundation blocks can be helpful when you are building large symmetrical buildings."'' (December 24, 2011)</ref>
* Foundation blocks measured distances to other foundation blocks.
* Allows measurement between foundation blocks.
** When equipped, measures distance to other foundation blocks in 3 dimensional space.
*** Can only be used when in build mode, where the player has an outlined box shown.

=== General ===
* New advanced “Build Mode” for quick world editing<ref>[[MinecraftEdu mod 0.975#logs|MinecraftEdu logs]]: "''<@kulttuuri> MinecraftEdu 0.975 was released just few days ago and it was originally meant to be a bugfix patch, but i got bit too carried away implementing something new into it, so there was also the new build menu."'' (December 24, 2011)</ref><ref>[[MinecraftEdu mod 0.975#logs|MinecraftEdu logs]]: "''<@kulttuuri> Been a long time and the release of our next version is close now, so wanted to show all of you the new build tools i’ve been working on."'' (February 21, 2012)</ref>
* Teleport blocks for public and private use
* Better support for sharing long texts in game
* More fine-grained control of student powers
* Many other little fixes and improvements{{Info needed}}

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Teacher menu''' 
* Added a new tab for building tools.
** <u>[[Teacher Menu#Building Tools|Build Tools]]</u>
*'''Use the MinecraftEdu build tools to create and modify the world faster. These tools include''':
** '''Build mode'''
*** Changes the way the player moves to be more precise
*** The player can move through solid blocks
*** Enables Long Distance Building which allows the player to place blocks up to 60 blocks away
** '''Fill/Clear tool'''
*** Allows the player to fill or clear large areas by selecting start and end positions
** '''Custom Place and Dig amounts'''
*** Set how many blocks are placed or dug with a single mouse click.
** '''Undo options'''
*** Undo latest events if the player does not like what they did.
